OnboardedInstitutionResource.description: Object that includes all info about onboarded institutions linked to a user

institutionId.description: The institution ID where users will be added. This takes precedence over the tax code

institutionTaxCode.description: Add users to the institution via tax code. Can be used in combination with institutionSubunitCode

institutionSubunitCode.description: Add users to the institution via subunit code. Can be used in combination with institutionTaxCode

sendCreateUserNotificationEmail.description: Send an email notification to the user. By default it's set to true

toAddOnAggregates.description: Enable automatic management of group assignment

id.description: User ID of a user already in the registry. A role will be added to the institution/product for the user. It takes precedence over taxCode

taxCode.description: The tax code of the user to add / create. If id is present, the field is ignored

name.description: The name of the user to add / create. If id is present, the field is ignored

surname.description: The surname of the user to add / create. If id is present, the field is ignored

email.description: The email address of the user to add / create. If id is present, the field is ignored

userMailUuid.description: The email ID of the user already in the registry to be assigned to the institution/product. This field is only used when adding a user by ID

role.description: The role to assign to the user

productRole.description: The product role to assign to the user based on the product specifications

env.description: Environment. The field is currently not used to create users. It's only returned in response

roleLabel.description: The product role label based on the product specifications. The field is currently not used to create users

number.description: The number of the current page

members.description: List of all the members of the group

items.description: List of all the members of the group

createdAt.description: Date on which the group was created

createdBy.description: User by which the group was created

modifiedAt.description: Date on which the group was modified

modifiedBy.description: User by which the group was modified
